title: How Shen Affords All of His Skins

replies.body:
Don't worry, there is still one more decent doctor who doesn't benefit on the suffering of others 
http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/92be610dd19c45185f7465cc590dca5e.jpg
Actually he gets gold for killing people for a living.
https://media.giphy.com/media/4pMX5rJ4PYAEM/giphy.gif
{{champion:119}} To cure this, i need to cut just a **little** off the top
{{champion:119}} ... of you. Not this but you. I'm referring to your head. You weren't using it were you?
Bloodletting used to be a standard medical practice.
You mean that one guy who used the laughing gas on himself instead of me, then proceeded to start the surgery before asking where it was?

http://media1.giphy.com/media/Oz9bz7gsPc4tq/giphy.gif
If you really don't like this excellent doctor I can always get you a nurse 
http://orig10.deviantart.net/c935/f/2012/262/f/a/akali_league_of_draven__by_armice-d5f8uu2.jpg

Pretty sure Amumu is scared of the face, not the needle.

{{champion:119}} "COME HERE AND GET SHOT, KIDDO!"
{{champion:32}} "PLEASE NO AUGH!"
Ahem... I think you mean Dr AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAven.
http://m.imgur.com/gallery/vB9B5?Noredirect

Lee... I have bad news... the reason everything has gone dark for you...

IS BECAUSE YOURE BLIND.

/s

Another Reason
http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-A4kV3gEwzI8/UORe8cfgvGI/AAAAAAAAAW8/iA231co4jlU/s1600/talesofvaloran027.png
That Yorick one though XD
Notice Vi has a porn magazine in the first panel.

> [{quoted}](name=DErpMAstEr651,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0Q9UFEVA,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-08-14T15:58:53.555+0000)
>
> Another Reason
> http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-A4kV3gEwzI8/UORe8cfgvGI/AAAAAAAAAW8/iA231co4jlU/s1600/talesofvaloran027.png

LMAO
Shen seems to be the only one worried about this sadly.
See, it's thematic. Shen is a peeler, a support, a person who will give you a clutch save. The other 2 are assassins.

> [{quoted}](name=Kingnewgameplus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0Q9UFEVA,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-08-14T11:49:25.904+0000)
>
> See, it's thematic. Shen is a peeler, a support, a person who will give you a clutch save. The other 2 are assassins.

Kennen isn't an assassin, he's more of a AP bruiser. Assassin implies instakill at many points of the game, and Kennen is more of a team control with CC.

> [{quoted}](name=JayHog1992,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0Q9UFEVA,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-08-14T16:48:13.203+0000)
>
> Kennen isn't an assassin, he's more of a AP bruiser. Assassin implies instakill at many points of the game, and Kennen is more of a team control with CC.

what. kennen will instakill any squishy

> [{quoted}](name=ApexCH,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0Q9UFEVA,comment-id=0002000000000001,timestamp=2016-08-14T17:36:25.933+0000)
>
> what. kennen will instakill any squishy

A bit hard to pull that off, but yeah, if the enemy can somewhat be braindead or so...
I mean after the most recent buffs to Kennen's ult he can kill most squishies with just R and W.

> [{quoted}](name=My Waifu Chocola,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0Q9UFEVA,comment-id=000200000000000100000000,timestamp=2016-08-14T18:46:29.854+0000)
>
> I mean after the most recent buffs to Kennen's ult he can kill most squishies with just R and W.

Seems a bit of a waste using ult just to kill someone except early game.
http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/69/6965f101c112540f4f5154c0631551c5a3e1278af5b31a1f5fc762447a1b3234.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=Vistha Kai,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0Q9UFEVA,comment-id=00020000000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-14T18:56:32.619+0000)
>
> http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/69/6965f101c112540f4f5154c0631551c5a3e1278af5b31a1f5fc762447a1b3234.jpg

Alright, I'll give you that. XD

Eh 120 second cd and Kennen typically ends up with like 25% CDR so it isn't THAT much of a waste if it is a hardcore pick. Also Kennen can just tp behind (or just flank) the back line and kill the back line or get them extremely low with his level 9 485 (+2.05 AP) on RW alone (which goes up to 728.75 base the second he hits 11 since his ult's base almost doubles).

I do not think Kennen is god like levels of OP, but he does do A LOT of unavoidable damage if he has flash up and it really only gets worse when he gets Rylais and Zhonyas.

> [{quoted}](name=My Waifu Chocola,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0Q9UFEVA,comment-id=00020000000000010000000000000001,timestamp=2016-08-15T03:16:29.429+0000)
>
> Eh 120 second cd and Kennen typically ends up with like 25% CDR so it isn't THAT much of a waste if it is a hardcore pick. Also Kennen can just tp behind (or just flank) the back line and kill the back line or get them extremely low with his level 9 485 (+2.05 AP) on RW alone (which goes up to 728.75 base the second he hits 11 since his ult's base almost doubles).
> 
> I do not think Kennen is god like levels of OP, but he does do A LOT of unavoidable damage if he has flash up and it really only gets worse when he gets Rylais and Zhonyas.

Pretty much, but again, he only does decent damage against enemies, after that if the team doesn't capitalize on the 1 man charge, he might die and the low HP enemies from that will get away. That's the common issue with Kennen, he can be handy, but not without a team.
As someone who died way too many times to kennen I must admit I'm a bit offended

> [{quoted}](name=hoes and bows,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0Q9UFEVA,comment-id=000200000000000100000002,timestamp=2016-08-14T21:27:52.494+0000)
>
> As someone who died way too many times to kennen I must admit I'm a bit offended

Bad game maybe? I should pick up Kennen again since I need level 7 as him... Or at least level 5.

> [{quoted}](name=JayHog1992,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0Q9UFEVA,comment-id=00020000000000010000,timestamp=2016-08-14T18:11:05.754+0000)
>
> A bit hard to pull that off, but yeah, if the enemy can somewhat be braindead or so...

Braindead in your context would include any champion that doesnt really build armor/mr

( adcs, assassins ) ?? 

In a world where hextech protobelt flash and kennens E is a thing...

> [{quoted}](name=ApexCH,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0Q9UFEVA,comment-id=000200000000000100000001,timestamp=2016-08-14T19:10:13.535+0000)
>
> Braindead in your context would include any champion that doesnt really build armor/mr
> 
> ( adcs, assassins ) ?? 
> 
> In a world where hextech protobelt flash and kennens E is a thing...

Trust me, I've seen a vladimir lose against Teemo, when he can literally shit on him by rushing {{item:3065}} first. Nothing surprises me anymore and anything can happen.

And I'm not even talking about the ocasional Garen/Darius that never rush spectre's cowl to counter AP laners or so.
honestly he's like swain but with cc instead of sustain

> [{quoted}](name=doombotMECHA,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0Q9UFEVA,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-14T17:07:45.761+0000)
>
> honestly he's like swain but with cc instead of sustain

Pretty much, his job is to go to the middle of battle and fuck shit up. Then dies afterwards because team doesn't follow up. XD

Well, I've always considered him an assassin because he has to get up close to do a burst combo which blows up a squishy, and his e isn't a dash but with how fast he moves it's good nuff. But then again I consider riven an assassin so maybe I'm just braindead retarded.

> [{quoted}](name=Kingnewgameplus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0Q9UFEVA,comment-id=0002000000000002,timestamp=2016-08-14T18:05:09.699+0000)
>
> Well, I've always considered him an assassin because he has to get up close to do a burst combo which blows up a squishy, and his e isn't a dash but with how fast he moves it's good nuff. But then again I consider riven an assassin so maybe I'm just braindead retarded.

He can do his job from a safe range, making him good enough to avoid Riven unless she wastes all dashes to get to you and end up with nothing.
{{champion:98}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:84}}  ->   http://cdn.smosh.com/sites/default/files/bloguploads/simpsons-money-fight.gif
Shen does not look pleased
Well, Doctors do get payed a lot afterall
And most of it goes to student loans and malpractice protection. Woooooo
I cant tell if Shen is pissed that theyre playing with the money or is jelous kennen is flirting with asian mom
it seems as though he is acting for the person on the phone, he is really laughing inside
